name: R5-UDIEntryType-R4-UDIEntryType
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 UDIEntryType into FHIR R4

element.display: a barcodescanner captured the data from the device label.

target.display: a barcodescanner captured the data from the device label.

element.display: The data originated from a patient's implant card and was read by an operator.

target.display: The data originated from a patient's implant card and was read by an operator.

element.display: The UDI information was received electronically from the device through a communication protocol, such as the IEEE 11073 20601 version 4 exchange protocol over Bluetooth or USB.
The data was read from the label by a person and manually entered. (e.g.  via a keyboard).

target.display: The data was read from the label by a person and manually entered. (e.g.  via a keyboard).

element.display: An RFID chip reader captured the data from the device label.

target.display: An RFID chip reader captured the data from the device label.

element.display: The data originated from a patient source and was not directly scanned or read from a label or card.

target.display: The data originated from a patient source and was not directly scanned or read from a label or card.

element.display: The method of data capture has not been determined.

target.display: The method of data capture has not been determined.
